fields.name: DataLocation
fields.description: The location where the SenderUsername resource data is stored at rest.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name for the senderUsername.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the resource. Unknown is the default state for Communication Services.

fields.name: Username
fields.description: A sender senderUsername to be used when sending emails.
